context.text: List of Mir Expeditions - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Expedition Crew Launch Date Flight Up Landing Date Flight Down Duration (Days)
This is a list of expeditions to the Mir Space Station . Unless otherwise stated, crew members are from the bloc of countries comprising the former Soviet Union.
List of spacecraft and crews that visited Mir List of Mir spacewalks
